(ROOT
  (NP (CD Oh) (RB yes) (. !)))


root(ROOT-0, Oh-1)
advmod(Oh-1, yes-2)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP think)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP I))
          (VP (VBP have)
            (VP (VBN found)
              (NP (PRP$ my) (JJ perfect) (NNP Poh) (NNP Piah)))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(think-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, think-2)
nsubj(found-5, I-3)
aux(found-5, have-4)
ccomp(think-2, found-5)
poss(Piah-9, my-6)
amod(Piah-9, perfect-7)
nn(Piah-9, Poh-8)
dobj(found-5, Piah-9)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP remember)
      (S
        (VP (VBG eating)
          (ADVP
            (NP (DT these) (JJ few) (NNS years))
            (RB ago))
          (SBAR
            (WHADVP (WRB when))
            (S
              (NP (NN someone))
              (VP (VBD ordered)
                (NP (PRP it))
                (PP (IN for)
                  (NP (DT a) (NN lunch) (NN meeting)))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(remember-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, remember-2)
xcomp(remember-2, eating-3)
det(years-6, these-4)
amod(years-6, few-5)
npadvmod(ago-7, years-6)
advmod(eating-3, ago-7)
advmod(ordered-10, when-8)
nsubj(ordered-10, someone-9)
advcl(eating-3, ordered-10)
dobj(ordered-10, it-11)
prep(ordered-10, for-12)
det(meeting-15, a-13)
nn(meeting-15, lunch-14)
pobj(for-12, meeting-15)


(ROOT
  (FRAG (CC But)
    (PP (IN at)
      (SBAR
        (WHNP (WDT that) (NN time))
        (S
          (NP (PRP I))
          (VP (VBD was)
            (ADJP (RB not) (JJ blogging))
            (ADVP (RB yet))
            (, ,)))))))

advmod(blogging-8, yet-9)

  (S (IN so)
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD did) (RB not)
      (VP (VB bother)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB take)
              (PRT (RP down))
              (NP
                (NP (NNS details))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (DT the) (NNP Poh) (NNP Piah)))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP derive)
      (NP
        (NP (DT a) (NN lot))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP
            (NP (NN pleasure))
            (VP (VBG chewing)
              (PP (IN on)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (NN skin))
                  (SBAR
                    (WHNP (WDT which))
                    (S
                      (VP (VBZ is)
                        (ADJP (RB almost)
                          (PP (IN like)
                            (NP
                              (NP (VBG chewing) (NN gum))
                              (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
                                (PP (CC but)
                                  (NP (RB not) (RB quite)))
                                (-RRB- -RRB-)))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

root(ROOT-0, derive-2)
det(lot-4, a-3)
dobj(derive-2, lot-4)
prep(lot-4, of-5)
pobj(of-5, pleasure-6)
partmod(pleasure-6, chewing-7)
prep(chewing-7, on-8)
det(skin-10, the-9)
pobj(on-8, skin-10)
nsubj(almost-13, which-11)
cop(almost-13, is-12)
rcmod(skin-10, almost-13)
prep(almost-13, like-14)
amod(gum-16, chewing-15)
pobj(like-14, gum-16)
prep(gum-16, but-18)
neg(quite-20, not-19)
dep(but-18, quite-20)

        (NP (JJ crunchy) (NN stuff))))
    (VP (VBZ remains)
      (ADVP (RB crunchy))
      (SBAR (IN while)
        (S
          (NP (DT the) (NNS turnips))
          (VP (VBP are)

              (CC and)
              (JJ sweet))))))
    (. .)))

  (S
    (NP (DT this))
    (VP (MD could)
      (VP (VB be)

            (NP
              (NP (PRP$ my) (NN vision))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (DT a) (NNP Dream) (NNP Poh) (NNP Piah))))))))
    (. !)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (MD will)
      (VP (VB need)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB try)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (JJ famous) (NNP Joo) (NNP Chiat) (NNP Poh) (NNP Piah) (NN one))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (DT these) (NNS days)))))))
        (SBAR (IN in) (NN order)
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB see)
                (SBAR (IN if)
                  (S
                    (NP (DT this) (NN one))
                    (VP (MD can)
                      (VP (VB be)
                        (VP (VBN topped))))))))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(need-3, I-1)
aux(need-3, will-2)
root(ROOT-0, need-3)
aux(try-5, to-4)
xcomp(need-3, try-5)
det(one-12, the-6)
amod(one-12, famous-7)
nn(one-12, Joo-8)
nn(one-12, Chiat-9)
nn(one-12, Poh-10)
nn(one-12, Piah-11)
dobj(try-5, one-12)
prep(one-12, of-13)
det(days-15, these-14)
pobj(of-13, days-15)
mark(see-19, in-16)
dep(see-19, order-17)
aux(see-19, to-18)
advcl(need-3, see-19)
mark(topped-25, if-20)
det(one-22, this-21)
nsubjpass(topped-25, one-22)
aux(topped-25, can-23)
auxpass(topped-25, be-24)
advcl(see-19, topped-25)
